result.arabic_text: قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ سُنَنٞ فَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
result.translation: 137.Nummah Siinik duma Yallih madqooqi dumi ummattal warrayteh moominiin koros Qeebit mokkoraamal, toysa moominiiney isin Baaxô Bagul gexaay Yallaa kee kay farmoyta dirabboyse marak ellecabo kah tekke inna wagita eile kas- kassowtaanamkeh.
